description:
This course is for startup entrepreneurs who need a simple understanding of bookkeeping and accounting basics and who don't have a lot of time.

It consists of 9 very short videos (they average under 3 minutes) that cover:

• creating invoices and getting paid

• receiving and paying bills

• doing a bank reconciliation, and

• how these things lead to your financial statements.

If you're just starting out and you want to manage your business more effectively then you need to understand financial basics. This course is for you.
title: Financial Basics for the Savvy Startup
